Sentencas: Glass-ceramic composites are among the few materials suitable for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) sealing application due to their high operating temperatures (600-850 degrees C).
Titulo: Influential parameters and performance of a glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Glass-ceramics can chemically bond to both the metallic interconnector and the ceramic electrolyte and provide a gas-tight connection.
Titulo: Influential parameters and performance of a glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, a careful manufacturing procedure, which includes several stages, is required to obtain a gas-tight seal.
Titulo: Influential parameters and performance of a glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, the joint strength of the glass-ceramic sealant between two metallic interconnectors is experimentally investigated for different surface properties of the metallic interconnector.
Titulo: Influential parameters and performance of a glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: According to the experimental results, the optimum sintering temperature and pressure are found to be 870 degrees C and 0.5 kg cm(-2), respectively.
Titulo: Influential parameters and performance of a glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the best bonding strength among the support materials considered is obtained for NiO. Furthermore, the sealing thickness is optimized as 0.6 mm.
Titulo: Influential parameters and performance of a glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells
